name: LazerWave Defender
description:
Use arrow keys to move left or right. Space Bar to Shoot

Thank you for playing game! This shoot-em-up game was made in about two weeks to improve my game development skills and I'm very proud of the result. Anyway, you shouldn't be reading this, you should be playing!!!

Made by Daniel DeRiso

Follow me on Twitter @Dan_DeRiso

Music by Alvin Anthony

Follow on Instagram @alvinanthonymusic
